Detailed Description

TerrainInfo is a container class that describes the local terrain, which determines the graphics used for terrain blocks, the available background props, the selection of tunnel types, and so on.

A given location is part of a large zone and a smaller region which is a part of that zone. For example, the "cooled lava" region would be a part of the "hot" zone.
